sub_title: IT ANALYST ADMINISTRATOR | FRONT-END DEVELOPER | CTE
summary: Motivated, bilingual (English, French) professional with a career portfolio highlighting bilingual technical support specific to new technology and information initiatives to customer services in the general industry landscape, moving from state-owned private organizations to fast-growing enterprises. Exceptional interpersonal skills, professional integrity and accountability to enhance technical knowledge in dynamic team environments. I develop new techniques, share ideas and mentor to influence colleagues and exceed corporate objectives. Adept at organizing and prioritizing activities in line with a results-oriented strategy to increase efficiency and streamline processes.

education.degree_name: Master's degree, Electrical and Computer engineering
Bachelor of Engineering - BE, Electrical and Computer engineering

profile_positions.description:
•	Integrate designs for our e-commerce websites.
•	Implement responsive designs to ensure optimal user experience on all devices.
•	Ensure compliance with web standards and security.
•	Administer and maintain IT systems to ensure the proper functioning of the IT infrastructure.
•	Develop tests to ensure that applications are working properly.
•	User support to resolve IT issues.
•	Install, configure and update hardware and software.
•	Diagnose and troubleshoot network, system and application issues.
•	Document problems and solutions.
•	Work with designers and developers to ensure design quality and consistency.
•	Troubleshoot and debug our websites.
•	Document development and integration processes.
•	Participate in current and future project design and development meetings.
Update web and development technology skills to stay current with the latest trends.
•	Plan and implement digital marketing strategies: Create and execute online advertising campaigns, email marketing, content marketing, and social media to achieve business goals.
•	User Interface Design: Redesign and design websites and other digital products using User Experience (UX) and User Interface (UI) principles.
•	Data Analytics: Use measurement tools to assess ad campaign performance and customer satisfaction.
•	Prepare plans, specifications and budgets for electrical projects.
•	Participate in the implementation of electrical projects, including installing and wiring materials and equipment.
•	Work with other team members to ensure electrical safety standards are met.
profile_positions.title: CHEF TECHNOLOGIC EXECUTIVE (CTE)

•	Data Analytics: Use measurement tools to assess ad campaign performance and customer satisfaction.
•	Collaborate with other departments: Work closely with other departments, such as development and product teams, to design effective marketing campaigns.
•	Project Management: Manage digital marketing projects to ensure projects are delivered on time and on budget.

profile_positions.title: PRODUCTS INTEGRATOR | DEVELOPER

profile_positions.description:
- ERP Integration with Zoho application 
•	Design and develop websites and applications for agency customers, using frontend technologies such as HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Wordpress, Joomla, PrestaShop.
•	Design and implement user interface (UI) and user experience (UX) designs for our websites and applications, ensuring that the user experience is consistent and optimal.
•	Work with the marketing team and product department to understand business objectives and design and development needs.
•	Optimize the performance, quality and speed of our websites for a better user experience.
•	Implement user interface designs for applications using UI/UX design principles.
•	Optimize application performance using techniques such as code minimization, image compression and caching.
•	Maintain, update websites and applications on a regular basis, ensuring they are always up to date and working properly.
•	Resolve technical issues and support for customers and team members.
•	Research and use new technologies, trends and development methods to improve the agency’s products in relation to our objectives.
profile_positions.title: Senior Frontend Developer

profile_positions.description:
•	Design the user interface for digital products (websites).
•	Create visual designs for print products (books, magazines, etc.).
•	Evaluate design usability and effectiveness using usability tests.
•	Implement user interface standards for the publisher’s products.
•	Define design specifications for digital and print projects.
•	Create artwork and templates for designs.
•	Directed the design of the graphic visuals and layout of Africa's Collective Memory project books which resulted in over 40 volumes of books of which 20 were in French, 10 in English, and 10 in German to date;
•	Directed the design, development, and implementation of the graphic material for the 2012 Unesco Slavery Exhibitions which won the Toussaint L'Ouverture Award
•	Connect with customers and internal teams to understand design needs and integrate them into the proposed solutions.
